data.title: Work and Society in the Orthodox East: Byzantium and Russia, AD 450–1861
data.meta_description: Often overlooked by Western scholars, the Orthodox East has provided some of the most important societies in the human experience. For a thousand years, Byzantium provided a living link to the world of antiquity. Over the last 300 years, Russia, in a variety of...
